content: knit all sts 3 st before the color change place 9 sts until the end of the round slip 3 sts of color b you are now at the place where the color b thread is k6 last sts with color b continue to work this way until the desired length **if you are not familiar with this method check helix knitting technique on the web © anna zhuravleva 2021 for personal use only page 3 heel flap the heel flap will be worked back and forth over 24 30 36 sts with the color a finish the leg after full row of color a stopping again 3 sts before the color change turn to the wrong side r0 sl1 p 22 28 34 k1 r1 right side sl1 yarn in front of the work k1 sl1 till the end of the round except 1 last st p1 r2 wrong side sl1 yarn behind the work p all sts except 1 last st k1 repeat r1-r2 for a total of 22 28 34 row heel turn right side is facing you r1 rs sl1 yarn in front of the work k14 18 22 ssk k1 turn 6 8 10 sts left on the left needle r2 ws sl1 yarn in front of the work p7 9 11 p2tog p1 turn 6 8 10 sts left on the left needle r3 rs sl1 yarn behind the work k all sts until 1 st before the gap ssk k1 r4 ws sl1 yarn in front of the work p all sts until 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 check yourself after each row there must be 2 less sts left on the left needle repeat r3-r4 until all sts have been worked 16 20 24 sts remain turn to the rs sl1 k all sts pick up gusset stitches using slipped stitches pick up 12 15 18 new stitches along the edge of the heel flap you can refer to the video https //youtu be/gzeialsntvk it is in russian language but you can see the process with sound off © anna zhuravleva 2021 for personal use only page 4 place marker m1 work the next 24 30 34 sts across the instep place marker m2 after them using color a until 3 sts to the color change slip 3 sts of color b continue to work with color b then pick up 12 15 18 sts along the other side of the heel flap now you have 64 80 96 sts gusset decrease set up round continue to change colors the same way knit 16 20 24 sts and 12 15 18 picked up sts till m1 skip m1 work the next 26 30 34 sts across the instep till m2 skip m2 knit 12 15 18 picked up sts gusset decreases r1 knit to 3 sts before m1 k2tog k1 work all stitches across instep to m2 slip m2 k1 ssk and knit to end of round r2 knit all
